meanings: 여가활동 What do you do to relax?
(휴식을 취하다) rest, relax, have[take] a rest, take a break, take time off, (informal) kick back
(일을) be out of work,, (휴가를 얻어서) take (a day) off, (일자리가 없어서) be unemployed, be in between jobs

examples.korean: His breath smelt of garlic. 듣기 Add to Wordbook (숨을 쉴 때) 그의 입에서 마늘 냄새가 났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His breath smelt of garlic. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She observed the gentle movement of his chest as he breathed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그가 숨을 쉴 때 그의 가슴이 부드럽게 움직이는 것을 지켜보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She observed the gentle movement of his chest as he breathed. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He reeked of garlic with every breath. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 숨을 쉴 때마다 마늘냄새를 풍겼다 Neungyule
examples.english: He reeked of garlic with every breath. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: A whale spouts hot, moist air when it breathes. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 고래는 숨을 쉴 때 뜨겁고 축축한 공기를 뿜어낸다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A whale spouts hot, moist air when it breathes. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Mucus catches dust in the air when you breathe. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 콧물은 숨을 쉴 때 공기중에 있는 먼지를 흡수한다. Neungyule
examples.english: Mucus catches dust in the air when you breathe. Add to Wordbook
